prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Vietnamese. 

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Note that the original timestamps should be PRESERVED for each entry.

PLEASE DON'T CHANGE ORIGINAL TIMESTAMPS.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:01:32,798",
    "end": "00:01:34,858",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "It smells so good."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:01:38,358",
    "end": "00:01:41,258",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "We need to put this as our cover,"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:01:41,258",
    "end": "00:01:42,398",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "our keeper."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:02:10,657",
    "end": "00:02:12,518",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "I'm going to put some pepper."
  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "vi": "Vietnamese text"
  }
]
```

response.vi: Chúng ta cần đặt điều này làm bìa,
làm bảo mẫu của chúng ta.
Tôi sẽ cho thêm ít tiêu.
